AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: In my 3 years as a dedicated developer, my commitment to continuous improvement has been unwavering. My expertise extends across a spectrum of essential development practices, including crafting meticulous unit tests, orchestrating seamless continuous integration processes, and adeptly fulfilling the responsibilities of a versatile full stack developer
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Technical Specialist
Description: Designed and implemented changes to software architecture, including breaking down monolithic applications into smaller microservices.

Successfully orchestrated the migration from Azure Web App Services to Azure Kubernetes resulting in cost reduction, ensuring scalability, efficient resource utilization and heightened controllability.
Attained a 99.5% uptime rate alongside an impressive average success rate of 99.98% for the application, guaranteeing seamless service continuity for valued clients.
Designed and managed Azure pipelines for CI/CD, streamlining the software development lifecycle.
Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams, facilitating open communication and efficient project delivery.

Experience.Jobs.Title: Software developer
Description: Spearheaded the migration initiative to upgrade a legacy .NET 2.1 application to the cutting-edge .NET 6 framework, guaranteeing compatibility and harnessing the benefits of enhanced features and performance optimizations
Played a key role in addressing and resolving production bugs to ensure the smooth operation of critical systems.
Engaged in sprint planning, backlog grooming, and daily stand-up meetings, actively sharing progress updates and identifying any impediments.

Achieved successful implementation of significant bug fixes, comprehensive logging and a restructured code for the TADA module, resulting in a reduced client churn rate and streamlined onboarding of new clients.
Developed a time-triggered and queue-triggered web jobs to meet various business objectives.
Enhanced API response time, reducing it from 900ms to 400ms, effectively resolving the day start issue occurring between 9:00 am and 10:00 am

Experience.Jobs.Title: Intern
Description: Accomplished the successful integration of QuickBooks payment functionality into the application, granting finance teams real-time access to billing data, thereby streamlining financial process.
Developed and implemented angular based web pages.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
